title: Effective Study Strategies Workshop
description: Join us for a hands-on workshop where you'll learn proven study techniques, time management skills, and strategies to boost your academic performance. Get ready to ace your exams and excel in your coursework.
lesson: Study Techniques, Time Management, Test Preparation

title: Digital Literacy and Online Safety Workshop
description: In this digital age, it's crucial to stay safe and informed online. Our workshop covers the essentials of digital literacy, online privacy, and cybersecurity. Equip yourself with the knowledge to navigate the internet securely.

title: STEM Exploration Day
description: Calling all young scientists and engineers! Join us for a day filled with exciting STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) activities and experiments. Explore the wonders of the STEM world and ignite your curiosity.

title: Financial Literacy Bootcamp
description: Take control of your finances with our intensive financial literacy bootcamp. Learn how to budget, save, invest, and make informed financial decisions for a secure future. Financial freedom starts here.

title: Financial Literacy Bootcamp For All Department
description: Alwatys take control of your finances with our intensive financial literacy bootcamp. Learn how to budget, save, invest, and make informed financial decisions for a secure future. Financial freedom starts here.

title: Coding Bootcamp: Web Development
description: Embark on a coding journey and become a web developer in this intensive bootcamp. Gain hands-on experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more, and build your own web projects.
